text: Amélie Mummendey (19 June 1944 – 17 December 2018) was a German social psychologist. From 2007 until her death she was a Vice-Rector for the Graduate Academy at the Friedrich Schiller University Jena. She was born in Bonn, Germany. She held a chair in social psychology at the University of Münster (1980–1997) before taking up a chair in social psychology at the Friedrich Schiller University Jena in 1997. Mummendey died on 17 December 2018 at the age of 74.Professorin Dr. Amélie Dorothea Mummendey : Unternehmensnachrufe ==References== ==Other websites== * Homepage of the Graduate Academy at the Friedrich Schiller University Jena Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths Category:People from Jena Category:German academics Category:German psychologists Category:Scientists from Bonn
title: Amélie Mummendey
